sent.orig: Compare happen, occur and take place.
Gastritis may occur suddenly (acute gastritis) or it can occur slowly over time (chronic gastritis) .
sent.trans: 胃炎可突发（急性胃炎）或随时间缓慢发生（慢性胃炎）。

sent.orig: Gynecomastia may occur with cirrhosis of liver, Leydig cell tumors of testis, or with drugs.
sent.trans: 男性乳腺发育可由肝硬化、睾丸间质细胞瘤或药物引起。

sent.orig: This receptiveness is the key feature in oestral behavior, enabling natural mating to occur.
sent.trans: 这一感受性是（雌性动物）发情行为的重要特征，使自然交配得以发生。

sent.orig: The Variants of Incoterms2000 frequently occur in the international commercial intercourse.
sent.trans: 在国际商事交往中经常发生Incoterms2000的变体。
